description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. We've all played physics-based games before. But have you ever tried one based on biochemical kinetics? BioHack is a simulation game where you must solve challenging design problems. The game includes 25 unique levels, plus randomly-generated mutant levels. No science background necessary!
